title: Joaquin Phoenix's 'Joker' Continues To Make Headlines And Other Top Entertainment Stories!
text:
It was a film that made reviewers call it brilliant but terrifying as a mentally unhinged outcast unwittingly finds fame through repeated acts of violence. The movie ran into several controversies, to the extent that costumes and face masks were also banned for moviegoers at two US theatre chains - AMC and Landmark - while the Alamo Drafthouse cinema group warned parents not to bring their children.

As a cinema-lover, it's only once in a lifetime that you get to watch something as iconic as Joaquin Phoenix's performance in Joker. The latest offering from Warner Bros. has smashed all box office records and minted USD 93.5 million over the weekend.

Expressing her views and talking about Kiara Advani's character Preeti, she explained why she ‘personally doesn't believe in a character like that.’

'No pain, no gain', is an adage that fits in perfectly in Hrithik Roshan's life. Despite the challenges that come his way, Hrithik continues to inspire for reasons more than one. When it comes to getting into the skin of his characters, no one does it better than him.

Director duo Anthony and Joe Russo had teased a team-up of major women characters from the MCU in their film Avengers Endgame, when every female superhero -- from Valkyrie to Pepper Potts -- combined forces and fought supervillain Thanos.
